Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 8 Tika, Saraṇaduka » 8.9 Dassanahetuttika, Saraṇaduka » 8.9.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Tika, Saraṇaduka
Dassanahetuttika, Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
33.
1798Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…  nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
